alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued March 03 at 2:59AM EST until March 04 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...Coastal Jefferson, Coastal Wakulla, Coastal Taylor and Coastal Dixie Counties. * WHEN...From 9 AM Friday to 4 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Water levels of 1 to 2 feet above normally dry ground along the coast are expected around the time of high tide. High tide around Apalachee Bay is around 1 pm ET this afternoon and then again around 1145 pm tonight. These water levels generally result in flooding of boat ramps, minor flooding of Old Fort Road in St Marks and Bottoms Road in Panacea. Additionally, water levels will rise to the tops of canals in Horseshoe Beach and Suwannee. Unprotected areas in Suwannee will experience minor flooding.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Dixie; Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla
